media/user/SCRAPE/test/2014-10-galdr/extracted/Galdr/07 Ancient Lights Of The Stars Nordstjerne
Galdr - Ancient Lights From The Stars
Galdr - Ancient Lights From The Stars

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 09, 2014 Description from Terminal Escape:
I feel like this is what I think black metal sounds like: bleak and depressive with tortured melodies and distant howls desperately saying something about vikings or some shit. Plodding, hypnotic anthems you can get lost in. Like you're in a forest or some shit. Maybe I'm wrong, but I thought that vikings and forests and torture are pretty black metal? No? ANCIENT LIGHTS FROM THE STARS
//3.bp.blogspot.com/-mCNGn3-V2_4/VDYNdRJ5MQI/AAAAAAAAK6w/eyxr8BCAG3E/s1600/galdr%2Bcover.jpg //4.bp.blogspot.com/-S_YMjvShidE/VDYPmpbmZ2I/AAAAAAAAK68/HMiT7iW81zM/s1600/galdr%2Bimg.jpg
